CustomField.description: Sets the Conga Template Category for NDA Templates based on EMPAUA Entity.
CustomField.formula: CASE( EMPAUAEntityRef__r.CompanyNameExternal__c , 'EMPAUA Ltd.','UK NDA Account', 'EMPAUA GmbH','DE NDA Account', 'EMPAUA GmbH (CH)','CH NDA Account', '' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets the Conga Template Category for NDA Templates based on EMPAUA Entity.
CustomField.label: NDA Conga Template Group
